subject: #SSN2666
description_text:
Hello,

Can you tell me when i get a track and trace number?
And when will the pedals arrive?

Thank you

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your package has been returned, and we will reship it from our German warehouse. However, the German warehouse is currently out of stock and will need a couple of days to restock. Once restocked, we will ship it to you via DHL Express. Please provide your accurate address again. Thank you for your understanding.

Hello,

Can you give me a status update regarding my order?

Thank you


Op 13 okt 2025 om 11:22 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:

﻿
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your package has been returned, and we will reship it from our German warehouse. However, the German warehouse is currently out of stock and will need a couple of days to restock. Once restocked, we will ship it to you via DHL Express. Please provide your accurate address again. Thank you for your understanding.
4819:4206036

Hi Erik van Empelen,      We shall arrange for your parcel to be re-shipped via courier. Please verify your address details to prevent the parcel being returned again.  Erik Van Empelen  Celebesstraat 52  5014 BS Tilburg  The Netherlands  +31 6 40893318

Hello,

I verify my adress
It is correct shown in this email

Hi Erik van Empelen,    We have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you and have provided a clutch as compensation. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Hello,

Thank you so much for your help and reply.
I hope to see the pedals very quickly.
